TraitDef.label: Galactic Heritage
TraitDef.description: This pawn carries the adaptability and resourcefulness of humans who have spread across thousands of star systems.

li.label: Galactic Citizen
li.description: Raised in a galaxy-spanning civilization, this pawn is versatile and quick to adapt to new situations.

TraitDef.label: Graceful
TraitDef.description: This pawn moves with natural elegance and poise, traits highly valued in Twi'lek culture.

li.label: Graceful
li.description: Natural elegance and social grace make this pawn excellent in diplomatic situations.

TraitDef.label: Hunter
TraitDef.description: Born with exceptional eyesight and reflexes, this pawn embodies the hunting culture of Rodia.

li.label: Natural Hunter
li.description: Exceptional tracking and shooting abilities make this pawn a formidable hunter.

TraitDef.label: Iron Willed
TraitDef.description: This pawn possesses the mental discipline and determination characteristic of the Zabrak people.

li.label: Iron Willed
li.description: Mental fortitude and resistance to psychological pressure define this pawn's character.

TraitDef.label: Tactical Mind
TraitDef.description: This pawn possesses the analytical brilliance and strategic thinking of the Chiss race.

li.label: Tactical Genius
li.description: Superior tactical and analytical abilities make this pawn an excellent leader and strategist.

TraitDef.label: Loyal
TraitDef.description: This pawn embodies the fierce loyalty and honor of the Wookiee people.

li.label: Fierce Loyalty
li.description: Unwavering loyalty to friends and companions, with terrible anger toward those who betray trust.

TraitDef.label: Frost Resistant
TraitDef.description: This pawn has the natural cold resistance of the hardy Nord people.

li.label: Frost Resistant
li.description: Natural resistance to cold and a warrior's spirit define this Nordic heritage.

TraitDef.label: Imperial Charm
TraitDef.description: This pawn possesses the natural diplomacy and leadership of Imperial heritage.

li.label: Imperial Charm
li.description: Natural leadership and diplomatic skills make this pawn excel in social situations.

TraitDef.label: Magic Affinity
TraitDef.description: This pawn has the natural magical resistance and aptitude of Breton heritage.

li.label: Magically Attuned
li.description: Natural resistance to magic and enhanced ability to understand complex concepts.

TraitDef.label: Sword Singer
TraitDef.description: This pawn carries the martial tradition and sword mastery of the Redguard people.

li.label: Sword Singer
li.description: Masters of blade combat with a strong tradition of martial excellence.

TraitDef.label: Highborn Pride
TraitDef.description: This pawn carries the superior intellect and magical prowess of Altmer heritage, along with their characteristic arrogance.

li.label: Highborn
li.description: Superior magical abilities and intellectual capacity, but prone to arrogance.

TraitDef.label: Nature Bond
TraitDef.description: This pawn has the deep connection to nature and archery skills of the Bosmer.

li.label: Nature's Child
li.description: Deep connection to the natural world and exceptional archery skills.

TraitDef.label: Orcish Strength
TraitDef.description: This pawn possesses the incredible physical strength and combat prowess of the Orsimer.

li.label: Orcish Warrior
li.description: Incredible physical strength and combat ability, following the code of Malacath.

TraitDef.label: Feline Agility
TraitDef.description: This pawn has the natural agility, stealth, and trading instincts of the Khajiit.

li.label: Cat-like
li.description: Enhanced agility, stealth, and natural trading instincts characteristic of Khajiit.

TraitDef.label: Swamp Born
TraitDef.description: This pawn has the disease resistance and aquatic adaptation of the Argonian people.

li.label: Swamp Dweller
li.description: Natural resistance to disease and toxins, with an affinity for wetland environments.
